column1: '''''The Hobbit'' Preface''' refers to the untitled prefatory note included as the very first section in ''[[The Hobbit]]''.
The note was first added to the [http://tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=21200 second edition of ''The Hobbit''] ([[1951]]).<ref>{{HM
column2: RC}}, p. lxviii</ref> In [[1966]], a completely revised prefatory note first appeared in the [http://tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=21450 Longmans/Unwin] edition.<ref>{{HM
column3: AH}}, p. 28</ref> The latter text has been used since.
